action.action-desc: Ms. Schakowsky (for herself, Mr. Beyer, Mr. Cartwright, Mr. Cohen, Mr. Conyers, Mr. DeSaulnier, Mr. Ellison, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Guti√©rrez, Mr. Hastings, Mr. Honda, Mr. Huffman, Mr. Langevin, Ms. Lee, Mr. Loebsack, Ms. Lofgren, Ms. McCollum, Mr. Murphy of Florida, Mr. Nadler, Ms. Norton, Mr. Perlmutter, Ms. Pingree, Mr. Pocan, Ms. Speier, Mr. Takano, Mr. Van Hollen, and Mr. Kennedy) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain provisions of the renewable energy credit, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Prioritizing Energy-Efficient Renewables Act of 2015.

section.header: Certain provisions of renewable energy credit made permanent

subsection.text: Section 45(d)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking , and the construction of which begins before January 1, 2015.
Section 45(d)(4)(B) of such Code is amended by striking the construction of which begins before January 1, 2015 and inserting is originally placed in service after October 22, 2004.
Section 45(d)(9)(A) of such Code is amended by striking and before January 1, 2015 both places it appears in clauses (i) and (ii).
Section 45(d)(11)(B) of such Code is amended by striking and the construction of which begins before January 1, 2015.
Section 45(d)(9) of such Code is amended by striking subparagraph (C).
The amendments made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2013.

section.header: Repeal of deduction for intangible drilling and development costs in the case of oil and gas wells

subsection.text: Section 263(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence: This subsection shall not apply to amounts paid or incurred in any taxable year beginning after December 31, 2015, by a taxpayer in the case of oil and gas wells..
The amendment made by this section shall apply to amounts paid or incurred in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2015.

section.header: Repeal of deduction for oil and gas income attributable to domestic production activities

subsection.text: Section 199(c)(4)(B) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking or at the end of clause (ii), by striking the period at the end of clause (iii) and inserting , or, and by inserting after clause (iii) the following:

clause.text: the production, refining, transportation, or distribution of oil, natural gas, or any primary product (within the meaning of section 927(a)(2)(C), as in effect before its repeal).

subsection.text: Section 199(d) of such Code is amended by striking paragraph (9) and by redesignating paragraph (10) as paragraph (9).
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2015.

section.header: Repeal of percentage depletion for oil and gas

subsection.text: Section 611(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking oil and gas wells.

paragraph.text: Section 613 of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Termination relating to oil and gas
subsection.text: This section shall not apply with respect to any oil or gas well in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2015.

paragraph.text: Part I of subchapter I of chapter 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking section 613A (and by striking the item relating to such section in the table of sections for such part).

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2015.
